name: Connecting Rajasthan
tag_list: connecting-rajasthan, rajasthan, rajasthan-social-network, rajasthan-patrika, rajasthan-tourism-connecting-rajasthan, free-deals-in-rajasthan, rajasthan-police, jaipur-metro, rajasthani-culture, ajmer-sharif, buy-local-sell-local, buysell-rajasthan, deals
overview: Connectingrajasthan.com is Rajasthan’s first online community.This social platform is for the people of Rajasthan and their friends.connectingrajasthan.com is exclusively dedicated to Rajasthan. The daily rigors of life leave people with scarce time to indulge in mutual interaction with others.connectingrajasthan.com offers you the advantage of reaching out to others from the comfort of your homes and offices and to generate camaraderie, acquire and share knowledge and experiences.connectingrajasthan.com provides the thrill of discovery of various facades of Rajasthan. connectingrajasthan.com offers vast opportunities to persons of all age groups to delve into the culture, heritage and ethnicity of Rajasthan. connectingrajasthan.com poses no barriers of caste, creed or social discrimination and is an open platform for free exchange of views touching all spheres of life. Those who have their roots in Rajasthan but are away from home have the opportunity to feel at home on the site with those who reside in Rajasthan, make new friends and revive old friendship with the classmates and past colleagues. The children can interact with their own age group and establish a social identity of their own. The students can learn from interaction with other students and hone their skills. The entrepreneurs have a looming opportunity to promote their business interests and activities. The hospitality industry in Rajasthan has another venue available to attract more tourists to the state. The institutions can reach out to the masses in the field of education and technology. Members of connectingrajasthan.com also have an opportunity to buy/sell products on connectingrajasthan.com and the buyers can directly contact the sellers and can take the deal to the next level. Members of connectingrajasthan.com can also buy deals of local restaurant,spa,saloons etc for FREE ! No credit card or debit card is required for them to buy the deals , the deals are 100% genuine and 100% FREE ! What is important and needs to be borne in mind is strict avoidance of spam and abuse of the site. If there are any areas of interest which impel you to seek more information on any of the specific features of the site and its utility, we shall be glad to explain the same to you. For any kind of queries and support feel free to mail us at mail@connectingrajasthan.com or send us a message at http://connectingrajasthan.com/contact/ To get in touch with us you can also give a missed call on +91-9667721006 and we will call you back at the earliest possible.
